justification: we agree with heritage that the difference between it original vision and the version enacted into law are not trivial and are enough to undercut the president effort to secure a heritage foundation seal of approval for his bill but the president helped his case by wording his statement with extreme care intentionally or not he gave himself subtle linguistic running room by saying that a lot of the idea for the exchange came from heritage including the concept of just being able to pool and improve the purchasing power of individual in the insurance market even if not all of the idea in the two plan are identical we feel that it wa fair of him to say that a lot of the idea are in common including the notion of pooling

statement: say mitt romney support cap and trade
justification: santorums ad say a machinegun wielding romney is firing mud to hide his own support of jobkilling cap and trade while romney appears to have favored cap and trade in the past his action a governor better prove his skepticism of the policy than his support for it when he could have signed it into law he declined and more recently romney ha repeatedly said he opposed to it update feb  22 2012 after we published this story a reader pointed u to an air pollution plan romney proposed that wa specific to massachusetts power plant it wa separate from the regional compact that we noted in the original item the state proposal set emission limit on power plant and included a safety valve feature which allowed the company to buy emission offset from environmental program rather than make the reduction in their own facility you could reduce your emission or pay into some alternative compliance fund said billy pizer a duke university professor who helped develop the plan he romney wa looking for mechanism that would still serve the goal of the program but would limit the financial exposure of the regulated firm to pizer these carbon limit dont fit the definition of cap and trade maybe youd call it the same family but it different because youre telling each source here what your limit is but you can buy reduction from these other program this idea of trying to limit business exposure from compliance cost is not a feature of cap and trade we also talked to fred bayles a former reporter for the associated press and usa today who covered romneys administration he now teach at boston university in bayles opinion the massachusetts pollution regulation fit the broad definition of cap and trade but he added it in the eye of the beholder we think the emission limit romney put in place might still raise the hackle of santorum and other critic of cap and trade but his program lacked the feature most commonly associated with cap and trade  namely an allowance for company that come in below their emission cap to sell credit to other polluter the new information add some helpful detail about romneys position in the past it is consistent with what we said in our original story above that romney had expressed some support for cap and trade but backed away from it when he declined to sign on to a regional cap and trade pact
